mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_message ( id, from_user_id, to_user_id, content, status, created_at, delivered_at, read_at ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{fromUserId}, #{toUserId}, #{content}, #{status}, #{createdAt}, #{deliveredAt}, #{readAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, from_user_id, to_user_id, content, status, created_at, delivered_at, read_at FROM chat_message WHERE (from_user_id = #{a} AND to_user_id = #{b}) OR (from_user_id = #{b} AND to_user_id = #{a}) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}
SELECT id, from_user_id, to_user_id, content, status, created_at, delivered_at, read_at, recalled_at FROM chat_message WHERE id = #{id}
